description: Modifies the parameters of a parameter group. You can modify up to 20 parameters in a single request by submitting a list parameter name and value pairs.

parameters.name: ParameterGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the parameter group.

parameters.name: ParameterNameValues
parameters.description: An array of name-value pairs for the parameters in the group. Each element in the array represents a single parameter. (dict) --- An individual DAX parameter. ParameterName (string) --- The name of the parameter. ParameterValue (string) --- The value of the parameter.

nested_items.name: ParameterGroup
nested_items.description: The parameter group that has been modified.

nested_items.name: ParameterGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the parameter group.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the parameter group.
